implementations.structures

Class DAGImp

  • java.lang.Object
    • implementations.structures.DAGImp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DAG

    public class DAGImp
extends java.lang.Object
implements DAG
    This class is an implementation of the DAG interface. It represents a Directed Acyclic Graph. Singleton Class

      • getNodeByName

        public Node getNodeByName(java.lang.String name)
        Searches through the DAG for a Node with the given name, returning that node if found. If none is found, null is returned.
        Specified by:
